name: Collab9 Secure Voice and Collaboration
long_description:
Collab9 offers cloud-based unified communications services including:
  • Voice
  • Voicemail and Unified Messaging (voicemail delivered to email)
  • Video (point-to-point)
  • Presence and Instant Messaging
  • Mobility Services (ability to use multiple types of phone devices to
  • access phone services) (Jabber)
  • Integration with Microsoft Exchange and Lync
The service is offered in a monthly, usage-based subscription model where a Customer / Agency subscribes to the services based on the number of users in its organization.
